Summary: lights emanated from mid valley, ascended mountain and flew in air beyond mountain peak until they visually dissappeared
trends: There have been no other sightings in Warnerville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsFor approximately an hour we saw these bright lights(orbs) ascended a forested mountain and headed off in the south-easterly direction from the mountain peak, a few appeared to descend from the mountain peak and never did reappear from where we lost sight of them into the valley. they may have traversed the valley only to re-ascend later? We were in the house looking out of the front windows. The brightness and the lack of any happenstance ever visible on said forested mountain. Bonfires(campfires) until they ascended and flew away from said mountain. Round, brightly, pulsating red-orange lights. Felt eerie and unnatural, as well as, glad they did not approach our location. They flew in a south-easterly direction until they seemingly just disappeared.
